tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: Integrated Filing Finance Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: Integrated Filing Finance Taxonomy for Disclosure of Related Party Transactions ( Regulations 23(9)), Quarterly disclosure of outstanding default on loans / debt securities (Regulations 30 r/w section V-B of the Master Circular), Statement of Deviation and Variation (Regulations 32(1)),Financial results as per NBFC (Regulations 33(3))
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:publisher: Securities and Exchange Board of India
